preqs: Students must have passed MKG2420 or MKS2420 or MKW2420 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB2420, MKG2420, MKS2420, MKW2420} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {3300, GBU3405%, MKB3405, MKB3440, MKC3130, MKC3134, MKF3131, MKG3440%, MKS3440, MKW3440%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKC3130, MKF3131, MKG3440, MKW3440}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}

description: This unit explores corporate strategy and marketing strategy, strategic perspectives on buyer behaviour, strategic use of marketing mix variables such as communication, pricing, distribution, product, external and internal decision environments, market position and analysis, corporate and marketing strategic direction, managing marketing strategy planning and control.
